articles.title: Sri Lanka seals historic T20 win over Australia
articles.description: Sri Lanka stunned Australia in a thrilling T20 match at the MCG, led by a brilliant bowling display from Wanindu Hasaranga.

articles.title: Kusal Mendis scores match-winning century against Pakistan
articles.description: Kusal Mendis guided Sri Lanka to victory with a magnificent 124 off 98 balls as they chased down 320 in Colombo.

articles.title: Matheesha Pathirana ruled out of Asia Cup with injury
articles.description: Sri Lanka fast bowler Matheesha Pathirana has been sidelined due to a shoulder injury, team management confirms.

articles.title: Sri Lanka Women clinch ODI series against Bangladesh
articles.description: The Sri Lanka Women’s cricket team defeated Bangladesh 2-1, marking their first series win in 2025.

articles.title: Hasaranga rises to No.1 in ICC T20 bowling rankings
articles.description: Wanindu Hasaranga continues his exceptional form and climbs to the top of the ICC T20I bowling rankings.

articles.title: Dimuth Karunaratne retires from ODI cricket
articles.description: Veteran opener Dimuth Karunaratne has announced his retirement from ODIs to focus on Test cricket and domestic tournaments.

articles.title: Sri Lanka to host England for Test series in December
articles.description: The Sri Lanka Cricket Board confirmed a two-match Test series against England starting December 2025.

articles.title: Charith Asalanka’s late surge powers Sri Lanka to big total
articles.description: Middle-order batsman Charith Asalanka smashed 87 off 60 balls as Sri Lanka posted 340 against Afghanistan.

articles.title: Chamari Athapaththu nominated for ICC Women’s Cricketer of the Year
articles.description: Sri Lanka’s Chamari Athapaththu has been shortlisted for the ICC Women’s Cricketer of the Year award after a stellar 2025 season.

articles.title: Sri Lanka A secure series win over India A in Galle
articles.description: Sri Lanka A won the 3-match unofficial Test series 2-1, with impressive performances from Nipun Dhananjaya and Lasith Croospulle.

articles.title: Angelo Mathews returns for Test series against New Zealand
articles.description: All-rounder Angelo Mathews makes a comeback to the Sri Lankan Test squad after recovering from a hamstring injury.

articles.title: Sri Lanka U19 team to tour South Africa in November
articles.description: Sri Lanka’s U19 side will play five youth ODIs against South Africa U19 as part of their World Cup preparations.

articles.title: SLPL 2025: Galle Gladiators crowned champions
articles.description: The Galle Gladiators defeated Jaffna Kings by 22 runs to lift the 2025 Sri Lanka Premier League title.

articles.title: Sri Lanka eye 2027 World Cup qualification boost
articles.description: After a string of wins, Sri Lanka is now in contention for direct qualification to the 2027 Cricket World Cup.

articles.title: Malinga joins Sri Lanka coaching staff as bowling consultant
articles.description: Lasith Malinga has officially joined the Sri Lanka national team setup as a bowling consultant ahead of the T20 World Cup.
